lesson: PowerShell here-strings must end with '@ on a line by itself at col 1.
Use single-quoted commit messages to avoid unintended $var interpolation.
Deterministic meta-merge only (temperature=0 or fixed seed).
Normalize raw.githubusercontent.com URLs in all indexes.
Cache poisoning guard for memory reads; short TTL or validation layer.
Favor conservative, reversible steps when ambiguous.
